text:
INTOLERABLE LIE : I recently shopped at Cold Storage and decided to grab some items from their Reduced to Clear section, expecting to get discounted prices as advertised. But surprise, surprise‚Äîwhen I got to the checkout, none of the products were actually reduced! The only exception was one package of cookies, which had a proper discount label (La Belleza, as seen in the photo).

So what‚Äôs going on here? How can a big supermarket chain mislead customers like this? If a section claims to have reduced prices, every item there should be marked down‚Äînot just one random product. This feels like a blatant attempt to trick shoppers into thinking they‚Äôre getting a deal when they‚Äôre not.

I‚Äôm done with Cold Storage. There are plenty of better options around, like Fair Price and small local grocery shops, where you actually get the deals you expect. If you value honesty in pricing, I‚Äôd suggest shopping elsewhere.

Staff here are poorly trained.
Went to the store around 10pm and had told the cashier that I wanted to use Yuu and AIA vitality. She said ok.

Proceeded to scan Yuu and the Yuu voucher but said to wait at the end for AIA.

After scanning, told me I can‚Äôt use AIA cause she already used the Yuu. And I‚Äôm like bewildered. Asked again and said she can‚Äôt ‚Äúgo back‚Äù cause the Yuu was already scanned.

Was quite annoyed cause the logic was not there. Clarified again and she said she thought I was using AIA voucher. Didn‚Äôt even bother apologising and just insisted that she ‚Äúcan‚Äôt go back‚Äù.

Was so annoyed that I wanted to just cancel the whole dam thing. Should have done so on hindsight.

Ended up not claiming my AIA vitality cashback which was up to $8. Such is unskilled labor.

Generally staffs service is good. But always impossible to find any staff at bakery in the evening, even at 7pm.

Breads are nice but not a good service after sunset üòë. If no service, don't give a hope with a sign "happy to slide for you"

One time, a man slided a bread for me but he needs to improve alot in his service/attitude. I did not enjoy shopping due to poor service.
better than ntuc marinated chicken, burger patties, steak, wagyu patties
Great place for some of my favourite grocery items! Parking at SiglapV is $1.74 for the first hour.
